name: Tamper Windows Defender - ScriptBlockLogging
description: Detects powershell scripts attempting to disable scheduled scanning and other parts of windows defender atp or set default actions to allow.
query: ((powershell.file.script_block_text:/.*[Ss][Ee][Tt]\-[Mm][Pp][Pp][Rr][Ee][Ff][Ee][Rr][Ee][Nn][Cc][Ee].*/ AND powershell.file.script_block_text:(/.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Rr][Ee][Aa][Ll][Tt][Ii][Mm][Ee][Mm][Oo][Nn][Ii][Tt][Oo][Rr][Ii][Nn][Gg]\ 1.*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Bb][Ee][Hh][Aa][Vv][Ii][Oo][Rr][Mm][Oo][Nn][Ii][Tt][Oo][Rr][Ii][Nn][Gg]\ 1.*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt][Ss][Cc][Aa][Nn][Nn][Ii][Nn][Gg]\ 1.*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Aa][Rr][Cc][Hh][Ii][Vv][Ee][Ss][Cc][Aa][Nn][Nn][Ii][Nn][Gg]\ 1.*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Bb][Ll][Oo][Cc][Kk][Aa][Tt][Ff][Ii][Rr][Ss][Tt][Ss][Ee][Ee][Nn]\ 1.*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Ii][Oo][Aa][Vv][Pp][Rr][Oo][Tt][Ee][Cc][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\ 1.*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Ii][Nn][Tt][Rr][Uu][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn][Pp][Rr][Ee][Vv][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]\ 1.*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Rr][Ee][Mm][Oo][Vv][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Dd][Rr][Ii][Vv][Ee][Ss][Cc][Aa][Nn][Nn][Ii][Nn][Gg]\ 1.*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Ss][Cc][Aa][Nn][Nn][Ii][Nn][Gg][Mm][Aa][Pp][Pp][Ee][Dd][Nn][Ee][Tt][Ww][Oo][Rr][Kk][Dd][Rr][Ii][Vv][Ee][Ss][Ff][Oo][Rr][Ff][Uu][Ll][Ll][Ss][Cc][Aa][Nn]\ 1.*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Ss][Cc][Aa][Nn][Nn][Ii][Nn][Gg][Nn][Ee][Tt][Ww][Oo][Rr][Kk][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ 1.*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Rr][Ee][Aa][Ll][Tt][Ii][Mm][Ee][Mm][Oo][Nn][Ii][Tt][Oo][Rr][Ii][Nn][Gg]\ $[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Bb][Ee][Hh][Aa][Vv][Ii][Oo][Rr][Mm][Oo][Nn][Ii][Tt][Oo][Rr][Ii][Nn][Gg]\ $[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt][Ss][Cc][Aa][Nn][Nn][Ii][Nn][Gg]\ $[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Aa][Rr][Cc][Hh][Ii][Vv][Ee][Ss][Cc][Aa][Nn][Nn][Ii][Nn][Gg]\ $[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Bb][Ll][Oo][Cc][Kk][Aa][Tt][Ff][Ii][Rr][Ss][Tt][Ss][Ee][Ee][Nn]\ $[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Ii][Oo][Aa][Vv][Pp][Rr][Oo][Tt][Ee][Cc][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\ $[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Ii][Nn][Tt][Rr][Uu][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn][Pp][Rr][Ee][Vv][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]\ $[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Rr][Ee][Mm][Oo][Vv][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Dd][Rr][Ii][Vv][Ee][Ss][Cc][Aa][Nn][Nn][Ii][Nn][Gg]\ $[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Ss][Cc][Aa][Nn][Nn][Ii][Nn][Gg][Mm][Aa][Pp][Pp][Ee][Dd][Nn][Ee][Tt][Ww][Oo][Rr][Kk][Dd][Rr][Ii][Vv][Ee][Ss][Ff][Oo][Rr][Ff][Uu][Ll][Ll][Ss][Cc][Aa][Nn]\ $[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Ss][Cc][Aa][Nn][Nn][Ii][Nn][Gg][Nn][Ee][Tt][Ww][Oo][Rr][Kk][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ $[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee].*/)) OR (powershell.file.script_block_text:/.*[Ss][Ee][Tt]\-[Mm][Pp][Pp][Rr][Ee][Ff][Ee][Rr][Ee][Nn][Cc][Ee].*/ AND powershell.file.script_block_text:/.*[Aa][Ll][Ll][Oo][Ww].*/ AND powershell.file.script_block_text:(/.*[Ll][Oo][Ww][Tt][Hh][Rr][Ee][Aa][Tt][Dd][Ee][Ff][Aa][Uu][Ll][Tt][Aa][Cc][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn].*/ OR /.*[Mm][Oo][Dd][Ee][Rr][Aa][Tt][Ee][Tt][Hh][Rr][Ee][Aa][Tt][Dd][Ee][Ff][Aa][Uu][Ll][Tt][Aa][Cc][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn].*/ OR /.*[Hh][Ii][Gg][Hh][Tt][Hh][Rr][Ee][Aa][Tt][Dd][Ee][Ff][Aa][Uu][Ll][Tt][Aa][Cc][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn].*/)))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((powershell.file.script_block_text:*Set\-MpPreference* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:(*DisableRealtimeMonitoring\ 1* OR *DisableBehaviorMonitoring\ 1* OR *DisableScriptScanning\ 1* OR *DisableArchiveScanning\ 1* OR *DisableBlockAtFirstSeen\ 1* OR *DisableIOAVProtection\ 1* OR *DisableIntrusionPreventionSystem\ 1* OR *DisableRemovableDriveScanning\ 1* OR *DisableScanningMappedNetworkDrivesForFullScan\ 1* OR *DisableScanningNetworkFiles\ 1* OR *DisableRealtimeMonitoring\ $true* OR *DisableBehaviorMonitoring\ $true* OR *DisableScriptScanning\ $true* OR *DisableArchiveScanning\ $true* OR *DisableBlockAtFirstSeen\ $true* OR *DisableIOAVProtection\ $true* OR *DisableIntrusionPreventionSystem\ $true* OR *DisableRemovableDriveScanning\ $true* OR *DisableScanningMappedNetworkDrivesForFullScan\ $true* OR *DisableScanningNetworkFiles\ $true*)) OR (powershell.file.script_block_text:*Set\-MpPreference* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*Allow* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:(*LowThreatDefaultAction* OR *ModerateThreatDefaultAction* OR *HighThreatDefaultAction*)))`
